title: karmamE balavantha
sahitya:
karmamE balavanta mAyA talli kAyArOhaNa jAyA



anupallavi



nirmalamagu nAgapuramuna nelakona nIlAyatAkSi sakala lOka sAkSi



caraNam 1



dharanu dhanikula kOri nA paritApamu dIrpa lErairi ani saraguna nE

     bayaludEri vacci parama pAvani nI sannidhi jEri nA



caraNam 2



vAridhi madi garvinci I vasudhaku tA rAnenci ninnu sAreku gani tala 

    vanci uNDu dhIratanamu galugu ninu poDagAnci nA



caraNam 3



kAsAsa lEni nAmadiki n  karuNayE dhanamani balki nindAsatO 

    vacci sannidhiki nijadAsuDaina shrI tyAgarAjunik
